item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description:
Changes

  • Limited the online functionality nag to Echo Arena
  • Reverted to old frame pacing behavior used in the initial 2.0 release

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed older games crashing due to an access violation
  • Revive: Improved handling of FoV stencils
  • ReviveOverlay: Fixed inject option in tray icon menu
  • ReviveOverlay: Fixed Oculus Platform heartbeat functionality
    • As contributed by @ahmanwoods
